Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Reroute at Racine/47th
ShortDescription: 44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 51st, Halsted and 47th: due to, street blockage near Racine/47th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Delays at Green Line Service
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are experiencing a delay at 63rd-Cottage Grove: due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Update to follow.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are experiencing a delay at 63rd-Cottage Grove: due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

 

 

Updates will be posted as new information becomes available.
